Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Glad to see you've got all the
materials for your renovation together.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
But as you can see, the weather's not so good
today. Don't wanna get hurt tryin' to work out in
that.
<PAGE>
Sorry, but wouldja come back on a nicer day?
We'll do the renovation then.
